solution_line_template: Number of half day preschoolers is {total_students} x {half_day_percent_num}% = <<{total_students}*{half_day_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={num_half_day_students}>>{num_half_day_students} students.
Number of full day preschoolers is {total_students} - {num_half_day_students} = <<{total_students}-{num_half_day_students}={num_full_day_students}>>{num_full_day_students} students.
